highlights: Member of the development team and mentored by Felix Amaya Valencia, from whom I quickly gained recognition and was assigned tasks of the same weight as those given to permanent members of the team. I was responsible for designing several modules of the ERP system and some sections of the company's database. Working there taught me to have a larger scale vision of a system and to understand the importance of knowing a problem in depth before writing even one line of code trying to solve it.

Originally tasked to be an assistant in technical support and server administration, I ended up doing all the engineering process to develop an Android application. During the time I was providing support, I learned to gather and interpret information about the experience of using software by users with little or no computer knowledge. During the development of the application I learned about modern software design architectures (MVVM and observer pattern), how to reverse engineer an existing system to integrate it to another with zero documentation, how to implement a REST API with PHP and Laravel, as well as how to secure the requests to the server through JSON Web Tokens.

I was in charge of developing and maintaining several solutions, the main one being the TimbraXML billing web application. It was the first time I felt I contributed things to a development team: good solutions for complex developments, turning repetitive processes into documented libraries, good flows with Git and promoting the use of modern and more readable syntax. Besides gaining a lot of knowledge of frontend and backend web development, I learned what is a good workflow among a development team, supported by version control tools, progression boards and effective communication channels.

projects.name: Costeapp
projects.description: Web application wrote in React capable of running offline that allows costing of cooking recipes.

projects.name: FiestasMexicanas
projects.description: A system for quoting, order management and piñata production.

projects.name: Asset validation application
projects.description: Android application to validate the existence of fixed assets with a QR code.

awards.title: Hackathon HackSureste 2018
awards.summary: Awarded third place for creating a high-impact innovation project. It consists of a system to deliver restaurant orders directly from the diner to the kitchen through voice commands.
